meanings.definition: To fight against or oppose something.
meanings.sent1: The brave knight was combating the dragon to protect the village.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers were combating the enemy forces in the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The cat was playfully combating a toy mouse in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The students were combating their fear of public speaking during the presentation.
meanings.sent5: The firefighters were combating the raging flames to save the forest.

meanings.definition: To take action to reduce or prevent something.
meanings.sent1: The doctor was combating the spread of the flu by administering vaccines.
meanings.sent2: The environmentalists are combating pollution by promoting recycling.
meanings.sent3: The chef was combating bland flavors by adding more spices to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The teacher was combating student boredom by introducing interactive activities.
meanings.sent5: The farmer was combating pests in the fields to protect the crops.
